下面是更正后的代码：


```python
def find_max(arr):
    max_value = arr[0]
    start_b = -1
    end_b = len(arr) - 1
    while start_b < end_b:
        start_b += 1
        if arr[start_b] > max_value:
            max_value = arr[start_b]
        end_b = start_b - 1
    return max_value
```
